author: danielf
msg: * Made service references available as servlet context attributes in the blocks.
* The BlockServlet can create and manage servlets given their classname as the property servletClass.
* cocoon-core and cocoon-web get their SitemapServlets created through BlockServlets.
* The SitemapServlet doesn't depend on any OSGi code anymore.

author: simoneg
msg: CSS classes added to key places of cocoon forms default XSL, see COCOON-1782. Should preserve any modification applied after my first modifications.
